publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-763 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Air Passenger Duty-That the Parliament notes with concern the continuation of Air Passenger Duty (APD) on flights to the Highlands and Islands; recognises APD as a tax on rural and island living and its detrimental effect on rural and island economies, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to abolish APD on all flights both to and from airports within the Highlands and Islands. Supported by: Colin Campbell*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-763 Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 12 April 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*, Brian Adam*, Shona Robison*

S1M-763 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Air Passenger Duty—That the Parliament notes with concern the continuation of Air Passenger Duty (APD) on flights to the Highlands and Islands; recognises APD as a tax on rural and island living and its detrimental effect on rural and island economies, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to abolish APD on all flights both to and from airports within the Highlands and Islands. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Shona Robison
S1M-763 Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 12 April 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*, Irene McGugan*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-763 Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 12 April 2000) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Andrew Wilson*, Michael Russell*
S1M-763 Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 12 April 2000) Kay Ullrich*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-763 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Air Passenger Duty—That the Parliament notes with concern the continuation of Air Passenger Duty (APD) on flights to the Highlands and Islands; recognises APD as a tax on rural and island living and its detrimental effect on rural and island economies, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to abolish APD on all flights both to and from airports within the Highlands and Islands. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Shona Robison, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Michael Russell, Kay Ullrich, Mr Kenny MacAskill
S1M-763 Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 12 April 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-763 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Air Passenger Duty—That the Parliament notes with concern the continuation of Air Passenger Duty (APD) on flights to the Highlands and Islands; recognises APD as a tax on rural and island living and its detrimental effect on rural and island economies, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to abolish APD on all flights both to and from airports within the Highlands and Islands. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Shona Robison, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Michael Russell, Kay Ullrich, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil
S1M-763 Air Passenger Duty (lodged on 12 April 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-763 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Air Passenger Duty-That the Parliament notes with concern the continuation of Air Passenger Duty (APD) on flights to the Highlands and Islands; recognises APD as a tax on rural and island living and its detrimental effect on rural and island economies, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to abolish APD on all flights both to and from airports within the Highlands and Islands. Supported by: Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Linda Fabiani, Brian Adam, Shona Robison, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Fergus Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Gil Paterson, Andrew Wilson, Michael Russell, Kay Ullrich, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan

S1M-763 Mr Duncan Hamilton: Air Passenger Duty—That the Parliament notes with concern the continuation of Air Passenger Duty (APD) on flights to the Highlands and Islands; recognises APD as a tax on rural and island living and its detrimental effect on rural and island economies, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to abolish APD on all flights both to and from airports within the Highlands and Islands.
